Package com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Calculator
    The Calculator calculates everything needed for the 3D/2D graphics.
    GUI
    The GUI is the place where the buttons, images and so on are placed.
    Mesh  
    Position
    The Position stores the x, y and z coordinates of something.
    Rotation  
    Scale  
    Scene
    The Scene is a JFrame that will be displayed.
    ScenePaint
    The ScenePaint is what will be displayed by the Scene.
    ScenePainter
    The ScenePainter does drawing work, it draws on the ScenePaint of it's Scene.
    SceneSettings
    The SceneSettings contains the settings of a Scene.
    Space
    The Space is the place where all SpaceObjects are.
    SpaceObject
    The SpaceObject is an object in the Space.
